name: Natsume Championship Wrestling
description:
Choose from 12 outrageous wrestlers, and bring the pain! Wield the massive power of Asteroid, the lightning-fast strikes of Viper, the underhanded attacks of Phantom, and many more madmen of the ring! With its robust grappling system and over fifty moves to master, Natsume Championship Wrestling delivers the deepest and most realistic wrestling action of the 16-bit era! Test your might against the crafty AI, or up to four players can compete in exhibition, tag team, and round robin matches!

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
